title: Client Keeps Disconnecting
body: My client (NA servers) keeps disconnecting from pvp.net and I have tried disabling IP helper, uninstalling and reinstalling the game, uninstall adobe air, get a new version of adobe air, factory reset my computer, I am running windows 8.1. I keep disconnecting then even if I close my game it still has me in the match que and it counts me as dodging.

replies.body:
While it seems like you've completed some steps already, we need to rule out your connection itself as a possible root cause as to why the DC's keep happening in the client.  Because of this, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664)!  It has the most common solutions that should get this resolved.

Let me know if it doesn't help!
